data.title: Copyright for images on the BODC web site
data.meta_description: The pictures/images presented across our web site have been gathered from many different individuals and organisations. BODC wish to thank all contributors and ask that users respect the copyright conditions.
data.text:
Picture copyrights

The pictures/images presented across our web site have been gathered from many different individuals and organisations. BODC wish to thank all contributors and ask that users respect the copyright conditions.

No part of this work may be reproduced or transmitted in any form or by any means, or stored in a retrieval system of any nature, without the prior written permission of the copyright holder. In the case of the NERC material at this site people should contact us. For non-NERC material, users can either contact us or approach the original source directly.

In addition to the copyright information for the picture used on our Home page and side navigation, see below, we have provided copyright pages for each of our main menu sections.

Search data

Submit data

Resources

Projects

About us

The images are provided as small thumbnails and may appear blurred. If you wish to view a picture in its full glory please click on the picture and you will be redirected to the page containing the picture. You will be able to return to this section via the link provided on the copyright symbol in the picture caption.

Home page

These are images that we use or have used on our home page and throughout our web site. 'Click' on the small image to view in a larger size.
